group_1.textLeft: I aim to draw upon myself the entirety of the@rage and grief from the Eradicators.
Everything began with my foolish desire for@sympathy.
I cannot bear to watch as more innocent Magical@Girls continue to vanish like this.

group_1.textRight: Please, Himuro-san, don't shoulder all the@responsibility alone.
I also bear responsibility for causing this situation...@Please, allow me to share the burden with you.
I also wish to take part in facing their negativity.

group_1.textLeft: To help everyone heal, let's embrace their@feelings together. All three of us.

group_1.textRight: Moreover, due to so many Magical Girls vanishing,@public safety around town has steadily declined...

group_1.textLeft: Right... Because contrary to what the Eradicators@claim, Witches are not actually fleeing from town.
If they continue to populate Yukuni City like this,@disasters and incidents will inevitably keep rising.

group_1.textRight: If we become the sole targets, then other Magical@Girls won't be harassed into Witches anymore.
We might be able to help the people of Yukuni,@even if just a little.

group_1.textLeft: I've come to realize that the goal isn't just to@heal the Eradication Faction,
but also to minimize the damage.

group_1.textRight: That's why you don't have to handle what's@happening in Yukuni alone, Himuro-dono.
Let's address both the Eradicators and the@Witches together.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, everyone.@It's honestly a relief having all of your support.

group_1.textRight: No need to thank me, ma'am.
So, what's our plan for handling this on our own?

group_1.textLeft: We will be using today's Nightlife Homeroom.
I've already discussed it with Urara Yume,@so please rest assured.
